summary: This document is a bank statement from Fifth Third Bank for the account of Disco Scientia Corporation for the period of September 1, 2016, to September 30, 2016. It details account balances, service charges, and criteria for waiving fees, indicating the financial status of the corporation during that time.

persons.name: Cesar Taverns
persons.context: Cesar Taverns is identified as the Relationship Manager for the account holder, Disco Scientia Corporation.

keyFacts: The bank statement covers the period from September 1, 2016, to September 30, 2016.
The account belongs to Disco Scientia Corporation.
The ending balance for the account on September 30, 2016, was $356.26.
A standard monthly service charge of $11.00 was waived due to not meeting balance criteria.
The document indicates that the business did not meet the criteria for maintaining a total monthly average balance of $3,500.
